column1: The Appellant in her dock statement took up the position that on the date of
the  incident  she  was  arrested  at  her  house  and  not  on  the  Awwal  Saviya
Road as claimed by PW1 and PW2.
Even though the dock statement of an accused has less evidential value, our
courts  never  hesitate  to  accept  the  same  when  it  creates  a  doubt  on  the
prosecution case. In this case, I consider it is very important to consider the
